statements: GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON compliance_regulations TO user1;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON compliance_records TO user2;
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON compliance_regulations TO admin;
GRANT SELECT ON compliance_regulations TO compliance_user;
GRANT INSERT, UPDATE ON compliance_documents TO compliance_user;
GRANT DELETE ON compliance_issues TO compliance_user;
GRANT SELECT ON audit_logs TO analysts;
GRANT INSERT, UPDATE ON user_profiles TO administrators;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON compliance_policies TO compliance_officers;
